original_text: If I had been cruel to them, God would be right to punish me. When God judges me, I would have no answer to excuse myself. If I had been cruel to them,
korean_text: 하나님이 일어나실 때에 내가 어떻게 하겠느냐 하나님이 심판하실 때에 내가 무엇이라 대답하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: If I had been cruel to them
God would be right to punish me
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 나를 벌하시는 것이 옳을 것이다

sentences.original_text: If I had been cruel to them
